content:
Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an iron_sword, I need to craft an iron_ingot. I have an iron_block in slot 44, so I will move it to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I can now craft the iron_ingots from the iron_block. I will move them from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: In order to craft an iron_sword, I need to first craft a stick. The only way to craft a stick without any other raw materials is to use planks. I have crimson_planks in my inventory and will therefore move them to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I will place another plank in the crafting grid to the right of the first one so that I can craft a stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I can now craft the stick and move it to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., 13)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an iron sword, I need to place 1 iron ingot in slot 1, and then place another iron ingot below it in slot 7. I also need to place a stick in slot 5. I have enough iron ingots in slot 11 so I will first move one there.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have moved the iron ingot to slot 1, I need to place another iron ingot below it in slot 7. I have enough iron ingots in slot 11 so I will move one there.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 7, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed the iron ingots in the correct positions, I need to place a stick in slot 5. I have enough sticks in slot 13 so I will move one there.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 7, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed the ingredients in the correct positions, I can craft the iron sword by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1
